episodes.title: Episode #4.1
episodes.plot: Chased by the DGSE and the CIA all the way to Moscow, Malotru tries to negotiate his return to France.

episodes.title: Episode #4.2
episodes.plot: Dumped by the DGSE, Malotru comes out of hiding and is quickly located by the Russian secret services. At the DGSE, Liz manipulates Sisteron to cause distrust between he and Marie-Jeanne.

episodes.title: Episode #4.3
episodes.plot: Arrested for Espionage by the Russian secret services, Malotru is tossed aside and left to the mercy of other inmates. Back in Iraq, Jonas suspects that a seemingly repentant Jihadist may be playing him to sneak his way back to France.

episodes.title: Episode #4.4
episodes.plot: While under pressure from the FSB to cooperate, Malotru is considering how to approach a cyber operations officer. Back in France, Marie-Jeanne seeks Mag's advice, only to find out that JJA had coerced him to resign.

episodes.title: Episode #4.5
episodes.plot: Just as Karlov is beginning to lose patience, Malotru suggests recruiting Ellenstein. Meanwhile in Mosul, Jonas and Jean-Paul are searching for a way through the ravaged city to get to the Collector.

episodes.title: Episode #4.6
episodes.plot: Under Karlov's watchful gaze, Malotru initiates Ellenstein's recruitment. At the DGSE, Sisteron suspects that Cesar is not ready to go on a mission and will not be able to hold his legend undercover. Back in Raqqa, still under Daesh's occupation, Jonas and Jean-Paul join a battalion of Yazidi women to track down Iode 3.

episodes.title: Episode #4.7
episodes.plot: In Moscow, Malotru welcomes César, who has taken Ellenstein's identity. Back in Damascus, the Syrian authorities refuse to let either Jonas or Jean-Paul access the morgue, where Iode 3's body most likely lies.

episodes.title: Episode #4.8
episodes.plot: Karlov asks Malotru to join the FSB in Moscow. In Paris, Sisteron and the entire Bureau must answer to an inquiry questionnaire on Marie-Jeanne, which JJA intends to use against her during the next board meeting. Meanwhile, Marina is resenting the way the Bureau is using Micha, afraid to once again leave a trail of destruction in her wake.

episodes.title: Episode #4.9
episodes.plot: Sisteron warns Marina that her cover has been blown, but that her arrest could help on another crucial assignment. Meanwhile, Malotru parts ways with Samara and comes back to France, where he is to be held in solitary confinement. Back in Syria, Jonas has lost Iode 3's track and must turn to artificial intelligence to try and find him.

episodes.title: Episode #4.10
episodes.plot: In Ukraine, Malotru arrives at the exchange location to get Marina. But on the way back, their convoy deviates from the route initially agreed upon by the DGSE, forcing him to warn Sisteron. Back in Paris, Marie-Jeanne quickly understands that Malotru's life is at stake and confronts JJA and Ponte. Meanwhile, Jonas interrogates Iode 3 to try and prevent an impending terrorist attack in France.
